gen:link.msg:message: `PreferredDividendDeductedFromResultForTheYear` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` is equal to `Na`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheet_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_PreferredDividendDeductedFromResultForTheYear')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheet_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_PreferredDividendDeductedFromResultForTheYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
